item.description:
Come out and play Bocce Ball!
Coles Tavern has an awesome Bocce Ball court and patio where we can head after palying a few games for a late dinner and some drinks.

How to play Bocce Ball: no previous skill needed
The first team member throws the pallino (target ball) and then rolls the first ball as close to the pallino as possible. Next, a player of the opposing team rolls a ball and tries to get closer to the pallino.  Each team must continue to roll its balls until it beats the point of the opposing team. While the object is to get close to the pallino, it is permissible for a player to play the ball in order to knock away an opponent’s ball.  Likewise, a player may play the ball so as to knock or move the pallino toward another of their own team’s balls.

Room for just Us!
The $18 fee includes our own bartender, bathrooms and direct access to the Bocce Court as well as the menu listed below. Drinks will be completely seperate, and paid as you go.

  • Appetizers - Buffalo Wings and Cheese, Cracker & Vegetables
  • Ziti Parmesan
  • Chicken & Brococoli Alfredo
  • Salad and Bread & Butter

I will bring a cake for dessert.

This event is for Funseekers members only, and would appreciate that the above not be re-posted on another Meetup groups site. Thanks!
item.name: Bocce Ball, Dinner & Drinks
